short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrogenLing is a Chrome extension that scans your webpages for broken links and gives you a report

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a web designer, developer, or content editor? Say hello to your new best friend, BrogeLing! This Chrome extension has your back when it comes to making sure your webpage's links are in tip-top shape.

Picture this: You're working hard on your webpage, and it's got loads of links. The last thing you want is to miss a broken link or 404 error that could turn off your visitors. That's where BrogeLing swoops in to save the day!

With a click of a button, BrogeLing scours through a webpage like a savvy detective, searching high and low for any sneaky broken links. It doesn't stop there - it also checks all those external links to ensure they're behaving properly.

The best part? Within minutes, BrogeLing serves you a comprehensive report right there on your screen. No extra fuss, no additional programs needed. It's like having a link-checking superhero right at your fingertips!

Rest easy, knowing that BrogeLing has marked the broken links for you. Easily copy them to your clipboard and tackle them head-on. Your website's performance and SEO rankings will thank you.

Level up your website game with BrogeLing - the ultimate guardian angel for web creators like you!

Features:
ğŸ“Œ Unique URLs: Discover all unique image and script URLs, ensuring better optimization.
ğŸ“Œ Link Status Check: Quickly identify active links and their HTTP status codes.
ğŸ“Œ Content Analysis: Count headings, paragraphs, forms, images, and scripts on any web page.
ğŸ“Œ User-Friendly: Simple interface, easy-to-understand data, and instant results.

Use Cases:
ğŸ” Web Developers: Optimize your website's structure, fix broken links, and enhance user experience.
ğŸ” SEO Specialists: Analyze on-page content, improve link health, and boost search engine rankings.
ğŸ” Content Managers: Ensure consistent content layout, check image and script references, and reduce load times.
ğŸ” Marketing Teams: Validate ad placements, track conversions, and fine-tune website performance.

Disclaimer: if you see some links in the reports that are unreachable, it's because your browser restricts the extension from opening links outside the page you're analyzing. Google "Cross origin resource sharing" for details.

To fix this, either disable CORS in your browser or send the URL to a stand-alone server. You can also contact us, request this feature and speed up the extension improvement
